languages.text: {n}Сержант, нахмурившись, смотрит на вас.{/n} "Не знаю, чего вы за этих дармоедов заступаетесь. Мне они помогать никогда не стали бы. Но и смерти они не заслужили, ваша правда. Не все, по крайней мере".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сержант, нахмурившись, умолкает. Затем внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Не знаю, чего вы за этих дармоедов заступаетесь. Мне они помогать никогда не стали бы. Но и смерти они не заслужили, ваша правда. Не все".

languages.text: {n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you stick up for these parasites. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them, at least."
languages.original_text: {n}Сержант, нахмурившись, смотрит на вас.{/n} "Не знаю, чего вы за этих дармоедов заступаетесь. Мне они помогать никогда не стали бы. Но и смерти они не заслужили, ваша правда. Не все, по крайней мере".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you'd stick up for these layabouts. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them do, at least."

{n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you'd stick up for these layabouts. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them do, at least."

{n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you stick up for these parasites. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them do, at least."

{n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you stick up for these parasites. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them do, at least."

{n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you stick up for these parasites. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them, at least."

{n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you stick up for these parasites. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them, at least."

languages.text: {n}Der Sergeant blickt dich stirnrunzelnd an.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht, warum Ihr Euch für diese Parasiten einsetzt. Sie hätten jemandem wie mir nie geholfen. Doch sie haben es auch nicht verdient zu sterben, da habt Ihr recht. Zumindest nicht alle."
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you stick up for these parasites. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them, at least."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Sergeant blickt dich stirnrunzelnd an.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht, warum Ihr Euch für diese Parasiten einsetzt. Sie hätten jemandem wie mir nie geholfen. Doch sie haben es auch nicht verdient zu sterben, da habt Ihr recht. Zumindest nicht alle."

languages.text: {n}Le sergent vous lance un regard noir.{/n} « J'ignore ce qui vous pousse à défendre cette vermine ! Jamais ils n'aideraient quelqu'un comme moi, eux ! Mais vous avez raison sur un point : ils ne méritent pas de mourir... En tous cas, pas tous. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you stick up for these parasites. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them, at least."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sergent vous lance un regard noir.{/n} « J'ignore ce qui vous pousse à défendre cette vermine ! Jamais ils n'aideraient quelqu'un comme moi, eux ! Mais vous avez raison sur un point : ils ne méritent pas de mourir... En tous cas, pas tous. »

languages.text: {n}军士朝你皱起眉头。{/n}“我不明白您为什么要帮这群寄生虫说话，他们绝对不可能像您一样，向我们这样的人伸出援手。但您说得没错，他们不该死，至少有些人不该死。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you stick up for these parasites. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them, at least."

traits.locale_text: {n}军士朝你皱起眉头。{/n}“我不明白您为什么要帮这群寄生虫说话，他们绝对不可能像您一样，向我们这样的人伸出援手。但您说得没错，他们不该死，至少有些人不该死。”

languages.text: {n}軍曹は、あなたにしかめ面を向ける。{/n}「あなたがなぜこの寄生虫どもをかばうのかわからない。こいつらは私のような者を決して助けなかっただろう。しかし奴らもまた、死には値しない。少なくとも全員がそうではない」
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you stick up for these parasites. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them, at least."

traits.locale_text: {n}軍曹は、あなたにしかめ面を向ける。{/n}「あなたがなぜこの寄生虫どもをかばうのかわからない。こいつらは私のような者を決して助けなかったろう。しかし奴らもまた、死には値しない。少なくとも全員がそうではない」

languages.text: {n}El sargento te mira con el ceño fruncido.{/n} «No sé por qué defiende a estos parásitos. Nunca habrían ayudado a alguien como yo. Pero tampoco merecen morir, en eso tiene razón. Al menos no todos».
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you stick up for these parasites. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them, at least."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sargento te mira con el ceño fruncido.{/n} «No sé por qué defiende a estos parásitos. Nunca habrían ayudado a alguien como yo. Pero tampoco merecen morir, en eso tiene razón. Al menos no todos».

languages.text: {n}Çavuş sana kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Bu asalakları niye savunuyorsunuz bilmiyorum. Yerimde olsalar kıllarını kıpırdatmazlardı. Fakat ölmeyi de hak etmiyorlar, orada haklısınız. En azından bazıları yani."
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant frowns at you.{/n} "I don't know why you stick up for these parasites. They never would have helped someone like me. But they don't deserve to die either, you're right about that. Not all of them, at least."

traits.locale_text: {n}Çavuş sana kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Bu tufeylileri neden savunuyorsunuz bilmiyorum. Yerimde olsalar kıllarını kıpırdatmazlardı. Fakat ölmeyi de hak etmiyorlar, orada haklısınız. En azından hepsi..."
